name: Bottom of The Barrel
description:
Bottom of the barrel is a more literal take on the cliché phrase "Bottom of the barrel".

In this game, you the player must fight numerous enemies in a turn-based combat  system, as you climb up the barrel with the goal of escaping through the top.

This game was made with sprig, so if you have your own sprig device you can also download the game onto the device to play.

Can be played:

  • On browser, on either desktop or mobile
  • On a physical sprig device (if you have one)

Controls:

  • A and D for moving around the map
  • WASD for navigating menus
  • J for select
  • W for when your character is in front of a chest or ladder
